artist: Designer: John D. Hall; Manufacturer: J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843-1950s
description: man with black hair, wearing black and grey suit, yellow vest and blue bow tie sitting in a red and white chair
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

on sides of chair, in relief: [TAMMANY / BANK (inside a circle)]; on back, incised: [PATd DEC 28 1873]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [#257-19 3 (inside a circle) / Tammany Bank / 7175 80 / 4120 / #224M]
title: "Tammany Bank" or "Little Fat Man" mechanical bank
